titleStmt.title: The VViltshire rant; or A narrative wherein the most unparallel'd prophane actings, counterfeit repentings, and evil speakings of Thomas Webbe late pretended minister of Langley Buriall, are discovered; the particulars whereof are set down in the following page. Also the proceedings of those in authority against him. With a catalogue of his untruths in his Masse of malice, and replies to sundry of them. by Edw. Stokes Esq;
titleStmt.author: Stokes, Edward, Esq.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ralph Smith, at the Sign of the Bible in Cornhill near the Ryall exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
